question: Pipe P and Q can fill a tank in 10 and 12 hours respectively and C can empty it in 6 hours. If all the three are opened at 7 am, at what time will one-fourth of the tank be filled?
explanation:
Part of tank filled in 1 hour when all three pipes are opened
$latex = \\frac{1}{10}+\\frac{1}{12}-\\frac{1}{6}&s=1$
$latex = \\frac{6+5-10}{60} = \\frac{1}{60}&s=1$
∴ The tank will be filled in 60 hours. 
∴ One fourth of the tank will be filled in 15 hours so the tank will be filled at 10 pm.
Hence option [C] is correct answer.
